channel.title: Cursor on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Cursor on Edd Mann

item.title: LEGO F1 Minifigure Scanner: A Quick Build with GPT-5 and Cursor
item.description: In this post, I share how I built a lightweight web app that scans LEGO F1 blind box Data Matrix codes to identify the minifigure inside. Using Cursor and the GPT-5 model, I put this together in under an hour - saving my nephews from costly duplicate boxes.

item.title: Vibe Coding a Chess UI: Building on the ESP32 with Cursor & LVGL
item.description: In this post, I share my experience using AI-driven tools like Cursor, Claude Sonnet, and OpenAI’s o3 to rapidly prototype an embedded chess UI on the ESP32 microcontroller using LVGL. Letting the AI handle implementation allowed me to stay focused on high-level design, iterate quickly, and stay in flow. Hype aside, it’s a powerful tool for exploring ideas faster.
